Desc.entry: Julian Brandram offers talks on gardening and the environment. Subjects include: Climbing Plants; Scented Plants; Gardens Great and Small; Growing Fruit (especially apples) - A talk for Autumn with a Tasting Session; Making Home Compost; The History of the Garden at Chatsworth; Art in the Garden. Talks on other topics can be arranged subject to discussion. Some of these topics can be covered as workshops for a whole or half day or combined to make a series of classes. Qualification - BSc. Fee by arrangement.
